channel.title: How do I change the Ip of 667/704?
channel.description:
i've looked everywhere, and me and a friend wanted to test out some things on our 667/704 source. But he can't connect because I don't know where in the client to change the ip. Can anyone help? All help is appreciated.
Edit: Just realised now that I posted this in Server Help, someone move to Client Help, please? :o

item.title: How do I change the Ip of 667/704?
item.dc:creator: @Vampire_0109 Vampire 0109
item.description:
@Vampire_0109 wrote:

Open The Client Folder
Client>src>Gamestub.java
Open the GameStub And find ‘127.0.0.1’
Change 127.0.0.1 to your IP Adress

Do the same in Loader.java

Need Help?? PM Me

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the Ip of 667/704?
